name: Hue Me, Baby!
description:
Dating in Full Color! Win their heart through the many frequencies of love!!!

This was made for the 2017 Global Game Jam by Sticky Biscuits at Indies Workshop in Seattle, WA over the course of a weekend.

The theme was Waves, and these were our chosen "diversifiers":

  • The colour and the shape: A colour-based game that can also be played by people who have any kind of difficulty seeing colour.
  • Chipping In: The game uses only 8 bit style audio, only 8 bit style visuals, or both.

More about Global Game Jam here.

Platforms: MS Windows

Best played with an Xbox-style gamepad (for the colored buttons).

Don't have one of those?

Just use WASD to move around & select color responses, SPACEBAR to interact.

Sticky Biscuits is:

  • David Evans
  • Nina Kim
  • Marshall Parsons
  • Tap Pribbenow
  • Jeff Sparks

Let us know what you think!

Coming soon: Spectral Grandpa meets Mermaid Grandma
